title: "Artificial intelligence developed for fighter jets"
excerpt: "BAE Systems is to test artificial intelligence technology to aid pilots, from its base in Lancashire. It forms part of a global Tempest partnership between BAE, Rolls-Royce, MBDA and Leonardo, to develop the next generation of fighter jets."
